entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
